title: Believe In God? You Might Believe In AI, Too
description: A joint university study suggests that people with a strong belief in God are more willing to trust advice from AI over humans.

title: Terra users face domain issue amidst legal drama
description: Terra issues are being warned of a temporary issue with Terra.money domains. Caution urged against access due to potential phishing threats.

title: US National Debt Surges $116,000,000,000 in August As Heritage Foundation Warns America Risks Reaching Point of No Return
description:
America’s national debt is rising at a rapid rate. The government’s FiscalData platform shows $116 billion has been added to the country’s total public debt since the start of August, bringing the grand total to $32.7 trillion. The rise comes amid a fresh fiscal warning from the Heritage Foundation. The conservative think tank’s EJ Antoni […]

title: North Korean Hackers Have Looted $2,000,000,000 Worth of Crypto in the Past Five Years: Blockchain Data Firm
description:
Blockchain analytics firm TRM Labs finds that North Korean hackers have looted more than $2 billion worth of crypto in the past five years. In a new blog post, the data firm notes that the staggering total was built up across 30 different attacks on crypto projects. The majority of North Korean exploits in recent […]
